overview: As Lucas Vick lays asleep on his bed, John Joseph assumes he is napping and takes the opportunity to sneak a feel of Lucas' manly body. When Scott stumbles upon Gunner shamelessly jacking his dick in his bedroom, he's surprised when Gunner invites him closer. When Damien Kyle comes through the front door, the last thing he expects to see is his roommate Zeus parading around the house naked.
title: Bros Banging Bareback
